key.name: admin_bottom_text
key.value: If you are planning to move your SkaDate Dating Software to a new location then you will need to get your license reissued. See https://hello.skadate.com/docs/manuals/licensing for more info...

key.name: invalid_key_text
key.value:
Your license key appears to be invalid. This error can appear due to several reasons:
- Changed site domain
- Changed site IP address
- Changed server path to the installed copy of SkaDate Dating Software

To resolve this problem please reissue your license in SkaDate Customer Area by following this guide - https://hello.skadate.com/docs/manuals/licensing.
Once the key is reissued, click the "Validate License" button below.

key.name: photo_setting_matching_label
key.value: Only show photos of users matching my "Looking for" setting

key.name: preview_match_sex_values
key.value: All account types on the site

key.name: speedmatch_mutual_message
key.value: Congratulations! You have a new SpeedMatch connection. Now strike a conversation with {$username}.

key.name: turquoise_index_join_text
key.value: Join our growing site, and meet dozens of singles today!

key.name: validation_failed
key.value: License key is invalid. Check the license key for typos and try again. Contact support team in case of repeated failure.

key.name: validation_failed_tech
key.value: Cannot connect to remote server. Please contact support team for assistance.

key.name: welcome_letter_template_html
key.value:
Welcome to {$site_name}! Thanks for joining us. Here are some quick links that you need to find your way around:

Main page - welcome!
Upload photos - you are guaranteed to receive no response without photos;
Change profile details - again, people will only engage if they get some impression of you. Invest time in your profile;
Change matchmaking settings - change how your matches are calculated based on profile info;
Look who's in

We are eager to send many dates your way!

{$site_name} administration

key.name: welcome_letter_template_text
welcome_widget_content
key.value:
Welcome to our site! Here are a few quick links that you need to start your way around:

  • Change avatar
  • Upload photos
  • Change profile details
  • Change matchmaking settings
  • Look who's in

Feel free to participate in our community!
